https://search.earthdata.nasa.gov/search.Description: The MODIS Atmosphere L2G Nitrogen Dioxide (NRT) product provides nitrogen dioxide data from the Terra and Aqua satellites. These data may aid in air quality research.
The MODIS Atmosphere L2G Nitrogen Dioxide (NRT) product provides nitrogen dioxide data over the United States. These data may aid in air quality research.

https://doi.org/10.5067/FIRMS/VIIRS/VJ11.Description: The VJ114IMGTDL_NRT dataset provides NOAA-20 (formerly JPSS-1) VIIRS I Band 375 m Active Fire Product NRT Vector data. These data may aid in tracking fires and aid in disaster response and recovery research.
